* { box-sizing: border-box; } body { margin: 0; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; display: flex; height: 100vh; flex-direction: column; overflow: hidden; } #chatContainer { width: 100%; height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; overflow: hidden; background-color: rgb(134, 134, 83); } #menuContainer { width: 25%; height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; overflow: hidden; background-color: rgb(184, 9, 9); } #chat { flex: 1; overflow-y: auto; padding-left: 20%; } .msg { margin: 10px 0; padding: 10px 15px; line-height: 1.3; border-radius: 10px; max-width: 80%; overflow: auto; word-wrap: break-word; overflow-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-word; white-space: pre-wrap; border: #c8ff00 solid 2px; } /* Markdown + código */ .msg code, .msg pre { white-space: pre-wrap; word-break: break-word; overflow-x: auto; max-width: 100%; font-family: monospace; background-color: #bdb8b8; padding: 5px; border-radius: 6px; } .user { align-self: flex-start; background-color: rgb(251, 253, 254); text-align: start; max-width: 75%; margin-right: 5%; margin: 15px; } .assistant { align-self: flex-end; background-color: #f3f3f3; text-align: start; max-width: 75%; margin-left: 5%; } /* Markdown */ .msg h1, .msg h2, .msg h3, .msg h4, .msg h5, .msg h6 { margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 1px; font-weight: bold; } .msg p { margin: 1px 0; margin-bottom: 0.5px; line-height: 1.3; /* adicione isso */ } .msg ul { padding-left: 15px; margin: 1px 0; } .msg li { margin-bottom: 1px; } #form { display: flex; flex-direction: column; padding: 1px; } #messageInput { width: 50%; height: 70px; padding: 10px; font-size: 16px; resize: vertical; border-radius: 8px; align-self: center; } #sendButton { background-color: #0644df; color: white; border: none; cursor: pointer; padding: 8px 14px; font-size: 14px; border-radius: 6px; margin-bottom: 10px; } #sendButton:hover { background-color: #0056b3; } .botoes button { background-color: #f73105; color: white; border: none; cursor: pointer; padding: 8px 14px; font-size: 14px; border-radius: 6px; margin-right: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; } .botoes button:hover { background-color: #c62828; } .botoes { width: 100%; display: flex; gap: 10px; margin-top: 10px; justify-content: flex-end; } #textBoasVindas{ align-self: center; display: none; } @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Russo+One&display=swap"); svg { font-family: "Russo One", sans-serif; width: 100%; height: 100%; } svg text { animation: stroke 5s infinite alternate; stroke-width: 2; stroke: #FFC61C; font-size: 25px; } @keyframes stroke { 0% { fill: rgba(204,38,38,0); stroke: rgba(255,198,28,1); stroke-dashoffset: 25%; stroke-dasharray: 0 50%; stroke-width: 2; } 70% {fill: rgba(204,38,38,0); stroke: rgba(255,198,28,1); } 80% {fill: rgba(204,38,38,0); stroke: rgba(255,198,28,1); stroke-width: 3; } 100% { fill: rgba(204,38,38,1); stroke: rgba(255,198,28,0); stroke-dashoffset: -25%; stroke-dasharray: 50% 0; stroke-width: 0; } } .wrapper { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; /* <-- elementos nas extremidades */ } .logo svg { width: 100px; height: 40px; } .toggleMenu { font-size: 2rem; cursor: pointer; user-select: none; } header { background-color: #f8f8f8; padding: 1rem; } .coluna1{ background-color: #0644df; width: 80%; height: 100%; } .barralateral{ width: 100%; height: 100%; /* Alinha os filhos em coluna (um abaixo do outro) */ gap: 10px; padding: 10px; background: #e7e4e4;
